title: Dark Sci-Fi Thriller Music Pack
description: This pack contains 14 original tracks with looped layers. It goes with sci-fi horror/thriller/action games
longDescription:
This pack contains 14 original tracks with looped layers. 

There are "full" versions of tracks and separate looped layers witch are numbered in order to give you an idea of how to match them to each other.


Pack goes with sci-fi horror/thriller/action games. Inspiration was a mix of cosmic horror and action with some SCP vibes.

Sound is a hybrid of orchestra and electronic. There are synths, cello, strings and horns with pretty big bass section.


Demo:

https://youtu.be/ta9gzrpZmWw

https://on.soundcloud.com/U4o5Q


Tracklist:

  1. Aftermath (01:48) + 3 looped layers
  2. Ascendance (02:30) +3 loops with 1 to 3 layers
  3. Breach (04:16) + 4 loops with 1 to 5 layers
  4. Containment Protocol (01:33) + 1 loop with 4 layers
  5. Data Expunged (01:52) + 1 loop
  6. Doomsday Machine (03:12) + 4 loops with 2 to 6 layers
  7. Hallways Of Time (02:46) + 2 loops with 2 to 3 layers
  8. Keter (03:49) + 4 loops with 2 to 3 layers
  9. Legacy (02:48) + 4 loops with 2 to 4 layers
  10. Operator Theme (03:28) + 3 loops with 2 to 3 layers
  11. Tension (2 versions) (01:24/01:25) + 4/5 looped layers
  12. The Foundation (04:28) + 3 loops with 2 to 3 layers
  13. Tracked (01:53) + 3 looped layers with intro versions
  14. Underneath (04:16) + 2 looped layers

+10 Sound FX

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Including loops with layers
  •  Sound has analog vibe
  •  Including sfx like stomps and risers
